GPUDeviceLostInfoReason.summary:
The reason read-only property of the
interface defines the reason the device was lost in a machine-readable way.
GPUDeviceLostInfoReason.value: An enumerated value. At the moment the only value defined in the spec is "destroyed", which indicates that the device was destroyed by a call to .If the device was lost because of an unknown reason not covered in the available enumerated values, reason returns undefined.
